tool.name: Annotate Gram Stain for Bacteria list
tool.description: compares bacteria strain name against a database and attempts to guess gram stain

param.help: Single column list of bacterial strains
param.label: file
param.name: file

tool.help:
Detect Gram Stain =================
Given a single-column list of bacterial names to query for, attempt to detect gram stain based on a lookup table.
